author: Sameer Suri For Dailymail.Com
title: Ariel Winter sizzles in tight mini-dress at Catch LA | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Her boots were a faded grey and stretched up past her knee, and her red leather purse featured a furry red ornament dangling from it. Winter's Snapchat Story that evening played host to an image of her in the selfsame dress, pouting as she lay sideways on her bed. She'd revealed to SELF last month that Sofia Vergara, her co-star on Modern Family, had helped her develop pride in her appearance. Braving the winter chill: The 19-year-old had pulled herself into a seemingly airtight white dress that bared a bit of her back and had a perilously high hemline She called Vergara 'a great role model,' noting 'her being a curvy woman that was super proud of who she was and what she looked like.' Recalled Winter: 'She could see that I was struggling a little bit with how to deal with my body, and was always trying to give me advice, like: "Here are some brands that would look good on our body type," or "Wear whatever you want, and feel good about yourself."' Winter moved in with her elder sister Shanelle Gray in 2012, which was 'really helpful for me' inasmuch as 'she’s the type of person that is confident in her body.' Artful contrast: Slightly embossed, the white dress clashed against a black leather jacket the Modern Family star had slung over her right shoulder as she headed into Catch Gray won a case to remain Winter's guardian in 2014 - permanently freeing her from her mother Chrisoula Workman - before the teen actress was emancipated in 2015. Winter reminisced that 'I would listen to her talk to me, saying: "It doesn’t matter what other people think. "You are who you are. It’s not going to change. Love yourself for who you are. People are going to hate regardless of what you do."' Grey had continued, per her sister: '"You could conform to everything they say, and they’re still going to find something to pick. Or you could be yourself and be happy and not listen to what they say."' Heading in: Her boots were a faded grey and stretched up past her knee, and her red leather purse featured a furry red ornament dangling from it Posing up a storm: Winter's Snapchat Story that evening played host to an image of her in the selfsame dress, pouting as she lay sideways on her bed Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
